name: Wendigo's Revenge
description:
Plot

You've found something while exploring the nearby cave. 

This atmospheric horror-themed endless runner will have you being pursued by the notorious wendigo. With simple controls and an immersive atmosphere, this game will challenge your reflexes and keep you entertained. So, gather your courage and face your fears as you try to outrun the wendigo. Get 'Wendigo's Revenge' now and see if you have what it takes to survive.

Controls

Use Enter and Space to navigate the menu. During gameplay, use "A" to jump. When the ammo is full, use "S" to shoot. Use "Esc" to close the game instantly.
